text:
You guys are actually going to get
 the ultimate hall pass

to explore what life would be like
 with someone other than your spouse.
I am doing my breathing.
Guys, give me your rings.

Take it off.
Take it off.

Your marriage perhaps 
doesn't have

maybe that fire that 
it used to have,

that fuego, that pasi√≥n, 
you know?
You guys ready to have some fun?

Yes!
Yes!
Well, here they come.
This experience, I'm hoping,

will give a spark
back to my husband.

[IN SPANISH] I feel Richard does not protect
me and since that's what I need,
[IN SPANISH] this show is worth everything.

I think living with these guys
 is going to be a fun experience.

Something will most likely happen, 
just a matter of time.

How do you think your wife
would feel about the date?
Oh my God, she's 23.

[IN SPANISH] Why did you kiss him?
Can you explain it to me?
[IN SPANISH] Because I felt like it!
It is now your moment of truth.

Do you, in fact, have a
love for the ages,

or will you decide
to walk away?
